biotools.summary:
USMPep: Universal Sequence Models for Major Histocompatibility Complex Binding Afﬁnity Prediction.

USMPep is a simple recurrent neural network for MHC binding afﬁnity prediction. It is competitive with state-of-the-art tools for a single model trained from scratch, while ensembling multiple regressors and language model pretraining can slightly improve its performance. In our paper we report the excellent predictive performance of USMPep on several benchmark datasets.
